title: Perma banned unjustified
body:
Dear Rito,

I believe your system for reporting is atrocious. I simply ask for ganks but end up getting banned, LITERALLY JUST FOR ASKING FOR GANKS! I even say GG at the end to get on your reporting bots good side. I really enjoy playing the game but find it stupid when I cannot even ask for simple things such as help when my lane is getting smashed by 2 other players, while my team simply abuses me for 'feeding'. Now all that money and hard work is gone forever. 

Thanks Rito...

replies.body: They will have emailed you a list of what you said, if you paste that here we can tell you how we feel about what you said. Also you would most likely had previous bans that have been escalated slowly

Perma bans aren't automated. Riot manually approves them.

Basically - You deserved it lmao.
If you were permabanned, post the transcript you got in the email.

you can always submit ticket in this case, but i highly doubt you were not toxic 

Perma ban= TOXIC
